top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

comments_since_last_sample.body: When casting a spell never “beg of you” always “ I command you to…” I want to add to my collection be nice if it’s on ITunes. Your awesome.
What a haunted version of a Phil Collins classic song.it sent shivers up my spine and gave me goosebumps
It seems Chucky was one of the thirsty DMs Vi read on her previous video. And they lived happily ever after.
Y'all crushed this one. Great job!

No you didn't ... Right after "Wicked Games"..?! And on Halloween when I miss my witch?! Damn it Viloet I love you and hate you so much right now. *Sniffles" rock ON Girl! Highest worship vibes M'lady, Hail HCU!
Well that was creepy as f---- and seriously bad ass!  Epic job guys!
Very brave to attempt such a classic song ............. Absolutely loved it :)

Originally this was about an assault Phil witnessed one night and how he struggled with whether or not to do the right thing. Though he did come forward and help, he found himself confused at how even the kindest person can experience these darkest urges. Very well done though.
Awesome concept and cover. Chucky licking getting spoon with u and then gets a kiss.
3:51 Looks like my muse is a great kisser <3
well i after i seen and listen wicked game wich was beyong great i see this .... well i pass
Violet channeling Jennifer Tilley is just great!
Are you on US? I ever tought you are Italian. But, then I saww that video where you speak Portuguese like a Brazilian. Where are you from Violet?
